data.name: DeadTruth: The Dark Path Ahead Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The official soundtrack from DeadTruth: The Dark Path Ahead. Composed and arranged by Rukas Skirkevicius. This soundtrack DLC contains all of the game music in WAV format.

01 - Angel Of Life - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (2:02)
02 - Below Ground - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (1:58)
03 - Calm Tone - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (1:21)
04 - Chase - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (2:20)
05 - Credits - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (4:08)
06 - Dark Dream - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (5:55)
07 - Dark Path Ahead - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (5:29)
08 - Darkness - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (2:30)
09 - Devils Trap - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (1:15)
10 - Empty Room - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (2:39)
11 - Enigma - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (9:19)
12 - Faceless Void - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (1:11)
13 - Fading Away - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (1:22)
14 - Left Alone - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (1:55)
15 - Main Theme - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (4:51)
16 - Menu Theme - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (3:35)
17 - Mind Maze - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (4:00)
18 - Never Ending - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (2:10)
19 - No Lights - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (1:01)
20 - Quite - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (3:46)
21 - Survival - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (0:54)
22 - Symbol of Death - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (4:49)
23 - Torment - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (4:41)
24 - Torture - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (2:57)
25 - UnderGroundTunnels - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (13:01)
26 - Walking Shadow - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (2:28)
27 - Weakness - Composed by Rukas Skirkevicius - (5:51)

Caution

To locate the downloaded files go to:
...\Steam\SteamApps\common\DeadTruth The Dark Path Ahead\DeadTruth - The Dark Path Ahead SoundTrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, or 7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, or 7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

movies.name: DeadTruth OST - Angel Of Life SoundTrack
